import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Context } from "../context/Context"; function Navigation() { const { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context); const PF = "http://localhost:5000/images/"; const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({ type: "LOGOUT" }); }; return (
Home
About
Contact Write
{user && "Logout"}
{user ? (
) : (
{" "} Login
{" "} Register
)}
); } export default Navigation;
